altername_name: シャイニング・ハーツ
name: Shining Hearts
overview: Shining Hearts (シャイニング・ハーツ, Shainingu Hātsu) is a 2009 role-playing video game published by Sega. It is the first Shining game to be released for the PlayStation Portable and is the third with characters designed by Tony Taka, the other two being Shining Tears and Shining Wind.
